function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of COVID-19 in highly populated cities","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus, increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Enhanced public health measures, improved ventilation systems, social distancing policies","Technologies":"Ventilation technology, monitoring systems, data analytics for population movement","People":"Residents, commuters, travelers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, city planners"},{"Description":"Impact of urbanization on disease propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of disease origination and rapid spread","Mitigation":"Urban planning for better sanitation, green spaces, and healthcare facilities, strict building codes for ventilation and hygiene","Technologies":"Smart city infrastructure, urban data analytics, sanitation technology","People":"Urban residents, city planners, urban developers","Owner":"City governments, urban planning organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of policy focus on urban context for COVID-19","Impact":"Risk of ineffective and inefficient response to the pandemic in cities","Mitigation":"Development and implementation of urban-specific public health policies, targeted communication strategies for urban populations","Technologies":"Data analytics for urban population, communication technology, targeted messaging platforms","People":"Urban residents, public health officials, policy makers","Owner":"Government, public health organizations, city officials"}]}
